comment: One of the two equality axioms of standard predicate calculus, called substitutivity of equality. (The other one is ~ stdpc6 .) Translated to traditional notation, it can be read: " ` x = y -> ( ph ( x , x ) -> ph ( x , y ) ) ` , provided that ` y ` is free for ` x ` in ` ph ( x , x ) ` ". Axiom 7 of [Mendelson] p. 95.
